app.name: PDKS
app.message: To use the application, you need to update the application to the latest version.

auth.welcomeText: Please enter your information to log in.
auth.signUpText: Please fill in your information completely to register.
auth.exitTitle: PDKS Users Are Not Recommended to Log Out!!
auth.exitInfo: If you click the 'Log Out' button, all your information on this device (your automatic login information, device information, etc.) will be deleted!!

leave.noLeave: You do not have any leave transactions yet.

inOut.noInAndOut: You do not have any shift transactions yet.

late.description: Could you explain the reason for being late..

early.description: Could you explain the reason for leaving early..

messages.network: Your internet is off. Transaction cannot be performed at the moment.

errors.qr: QR Code could not be parsed.
errors.qrError: You are not allowed to extend the area notification.
errors.inError: You have an entry transaction for today.
errors.outError: You have an exit transaction for today.
errors.location: Please wait for location information to be retrieved.
errors.locationError: Your location is not suitable for the transaction.
errors.loginError: Email or password cannot be empty
errors.loginError2: Please enter the requested information completely.
errors.emailValid: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.passwordValid: Password length cannot be less than 6 characters!
errors.registerNameError: Name - Surname field must consist of at least 5 characters.

location.isEnableAlert:
Phone Location Appears to be Off
Please Turn On Your Location
location.isNotEnableAlert:
You have denied PDKS location permission.
Please allow location access from app settings.
location.isMockTitle: Using fake location violates PDKS rules.
location.isMockDescription: To use the PDKS application, make sure there is no fake location service application on your phone.

security.hack: You have been detected trying to break the system. Since you violated PDKS rules, we cannot allow you to continue using the application.

dialog.alertDescription: Description field is required and must consist of at least 5 characters.
dialog.enterTheAddress: Are you sure you want to enter the address?
